thread.title: Great hotel, fantastic location!
thread.title_full: Great hotel, fantastic location! - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: HI_McDunnough
title: Great hotel, fantastic location!
text: My family and I stayed at the Courtyard in Times Square and we were so happy with our choice. The location is right in the middle of everything, within easy walking distance of all of Times Square, the Theater District, and Hell's Kitchen. The staff are very helpful and friendly and the room was very clean.
